media:group.media:title: The Galilean Transformation
media:group.media:description:
In this video we're going to talk about the Galilean transformation and how it helps us to transform between the coordinates of moving frames of reference.

Prerequisites:
- Kinematics in 1D
- Change of Basis

Lecture notes:
